description: Former Derry football boss Rory Gallagher's appointment to a coaching role with Kildare club champions Naas appears to have unravelled.
title: Rory Gallagher: Ex-Derry football manager's Naas club coaching role now in doubt
title_page: Rory Gallagher: Ex-Derry football manager's Naas club coaching role now in doubt - BBC Sport
maintext:
Former Derry football manager Rory Gallagher's appointment to a coaching role with Kildare senior club champions Naas has reportedly unravelled.
On Sunday, the Kildare club confirmed Gallagher's arrival to the backroom team of manager Joe Murphy in a brief statement.
However, the Leinster Leader said on Monday, external that Naas had performed a u-turn with Gallagher's appointment not now going ahead.
Amid a flurry of similar reports, the Irish Times later stated that a Naas club spokesman had said: "Rory Gallagher is now not part of the Naas senior football coaching and management team".
BBC Sport NI has contacted the Naas club and GAA headquarters at Croke Park.
Sunday's Naas statement had said: "Joe Murphy has been reappointed into the role of Naas senior football manager for 2025.
"Joe has confirmed that his management team will consist of Rory Gallagher, Padraic Cribben, Kevin Martin, Martin Sweeney and Fionn Higgins."
